stories.original_headline: New research reveals how everyday cues secretly shape your habits
stories.original_summary: Researchers uncovered how shifting levels of a brain protein called KCC2 can reshape the way cues become linked with rewards, sometimes making habits form more quickly or more powerfully than expected. stories.fantasy_headline: Wizards Discover Magic Behind Your Daily Habits
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Wizards of the Mind have discovered a secret enchantment within everyone's spirit. They found that subtle shifts in a magical essence can make small signs link to desires, causing daily routines to take hold faster. When this essence wanes, inner magic sparks brighter, making new connections stronger than ever.

stories.original_headline: The deep ocean is fixing carbon in ways no one expected
stories.original_summary: Researchers have uncovered surprising evidence that the deep ocean’s carbon-fixing engine works very differently than long assumed. stories.fantasy_headline: Deep Sea Sages Discover Ocean's Hidden Breath
stories.fantasy_story: Deep Sea Sages have made a startling discovery about how the great ocean breathes. They learned the sunless depths fix dark energies not by the tiny water sprites once thought, but by other, unseen sea creatures. These minuscule guardians maintain the ocean's balance in surprising new ways.

stories.original_headline: Adobe sees a bright future as AI bet pays off
stories.original_summary: Entrenching generative AI into Adobe's creative software ecosystem is paying off, according to the company's latest earnings. stories.fantasy_headline: Adobe Guild Thrives as Enchanted Automatons Prove Worthy
stories.fantasy_story: The venerable Adobe Artificers' Guild is enjoying great prosperity! Their bold choice to weave enchanted automatons into their creative spells has brought a surge of gold coins. Even though the Guild's perceived worth wavered earlier, their annual treasury now swells to record sums, proving the golems' power.

stories.original_summary: Retro gaming handheld manufacturer Ayaneo has finally revealed the design of its first Android phone, which has been teased since August. stories.fantasy_headline: Ayaneo Clan Unveils New Scrying Mirror with Hidden Controls
stories.fantasy_story: The renowned Ayaneo Tinkerers' Clan has unveiled their latest creation: a unique Pocket Oracle! This magical scrying mirror is a tribute to the legendary Xperia Play artifact of old. It features a special panel that slides up, revealing a hidden set of arcane buttons and levers for wondrous enchantments and games.
